modName: DDD - Main Menu Theme Custom Music Replacer
summary: Replaces the main theme with an orchestral piece I made a few years ago called \"The Hero Falls\"
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]l0eaLki58P4[/youtube]

Replaces the main theme with an orchestral piece I made a few years ago called \"The Hero Falls\".

I did this out of mere curiousity at first, then realised it seemed to fit into the game quite well!

You can listen to it on Soundcloud here:
http://soundcloud.com/protoneutro/the-hero-falls

Attention!!!
This is my own music work, so don\'t you dare upload it to any other sites. I reserve full copyrights over this.

Break this simple rule and I will hunt you down and proceed to shout you into non-existence with a real thu\'um...
author: Demidekidasu
